title: Flavourful pea soup
ingredients: ['50g (2 oz) butter or bacon fat', '225g (8 oz) carrots, diced', '2 sticks celery, diced', '110g (4 oz) onions, diced', '225g (8 oz) dried peas, soaked overnight and drained', '1.8L (3pt) stock', '1 small ham shank or knuckle, soaked in water for a few hours', 'ground black pepper, to taste', '1 dessertspoon chopped mint or parsley']
